POWERED by FUSION

An individual post follows.

Further Hip-Hop Politics

It’s nice to know I’m not the only one feeling the way I do about today’s hip-hop, and it’s nice to
know that it’s not simply an “outsider’s” perspective, if you want to play the race game. Pierre
Bennu’s “Fuck Hip-Hop” rant communicates
the desperate longing of real hip-hop fan, and a DJ at that, for a reorientation of values in the
hip-hop community. Read it.

—Nov 28, 2002
